channel.title: Business on Saúl Gallegos
channel.description: Recent content in Business on Saúl Gallegos

item.title: About Sourcechat, my new company
item.description: I created a new company called sourcechat.io. Maybe ‘company’ is a bit broad, Sourcechat is a Saas, someone could even argue that is a micro-saas because the only purpose of it is to give early founders an affordable and smart AI chatbot for their websites. I think is a great product Anyone can get started for free No credit card needed You can setup a chatbot in a couple of minutes And only if you found the chatbot useful you can upgrade to a premium plan.
